title: Artificial Intelligence: Revolutionizing Every Aspect of Life - Markets Mixed as Investors Weigh Retail Sales and AI Spending
description: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is rapidly redefining the way we live, work, and interact. No longer confined to the realm of science fiction, AI is now a driving force behind innovations across all sectors— from healthcare and finance to entertainment and manufacturing. Its impact is far-reaching, transforming industries, reshaping economies, and influencing the way we navigate daily life.

title: Freshworks forecasts annual revenue above estimates on strong AI-driven software demand

title: Bond Dealers Push Up BDC Trading Costs Amid Software Slide
description: Wall Street dealers are demanding higher compensation to trade corporate bonds issued by private credit funds, as investors turn squeamish about the funds’ exposure to software firms facing artificial intelligence disruption.

title: Google turns to century-long bonds as AI infrastructure spending soars
description: Google parent Alphabet plans to raise about $20 billion, including rare 100-year bonds, as it ramps up massive spending on artificial intelligence infrastructure amid intense competition and mixed investor reactions.
content:
Google-parent Alphabet will issue bonds maturing in 100 years as it continues to invest massively in infrastructure for artificial intelligence, according to data published Tuesday by Bloomberg.
